AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required by Condition 5 (CO2 Emissions and Water Useage) of Planning permission 18/12032/FUL (Alterations to existing shopfront with insertion of new door to provide access to first floor and internal alterations to first floor and internal alterations to first floor and new fenestration and privacy screen at first floor rear to facilitate use of 1st floor as 1 x 2 bed self-contained residential unit)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.

I acknowledge receipt of your payment for £ 103.00, the fee required for this application is £ 206.00, therefore please forward the outstanding balance of £103.00 as soon as possible.Note: Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
